Title: Relates to providing judges more discretion regarding securing orders and limiting the lengths of certain orders; repealer
Summary: Relates to providing judges more discretion regarding securing orders and limiting the lengths of certain orders.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law, in relation to providing judges more discretion regarding securing orders and limiting the lengths of certain orders; and to repeal certain provisions of the criminal procedure law, the judiciary law and the executive law relating thereto
